hero.title: Who We Serve?
hero.subtitle: Where Intelligence Meets Creativity
hero.description: An AI creative studio delivering premium digital experiences with Apple-level refinement and modern AI startup energy.
hero.aboutDescription:
We serve businesses, institutions, and ambitious entrepreneurs who seek to elevate their operations through intelligent digital solutions.
We help our clients accelerate growth, improve efficiency, and build a strong presence in a rapidly changing world.
With us, you gain a strategic partner that delivers expertise, innovation, and complete support to achieve your goals with confidence.

validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters

guarantee.title: Quick Response Guarantee
guarantee.description: We typically respond to all inquiries within 2 hours during business hours. For urgent matters, please call us directly.

about.title: About Us
about.content: ORNINA is a leading company providing innovative digital solutions powered by artificial intelligence. We blend technology and art to create a new future for marketing and media production. We believe AI is not a replacement for human creativity, but a tool that enhances its power.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We create the future of business and creativity through AI solutions that make a real difference in the lives of individuals and companies.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Empower individuals and organizations to achieve sustainable digital growth and unleash their creative potential using artificial intelligence.

general.title: Enterprise Solutions (B2B)
general.content: Empowering businesses with digital and creative transformation through artificial intelligence.

official.title: Government & Public Institutions
official.content: Supporting digital transformation and institutional intelligence in public services, service automation, citizen chatbots, interactive dashboards, and media content analysis.

creative.title: Startups & Entrepreneurs
creative.content: Enabling startups to launch with powerful digital capabilities and professional visual design.

executive.title: Media & Creative Production
executive.content: Supporting digital transformation for traditional and visual media through animation, virtual influencers, digital advertising production, and AI-powered audience and content analytics.

comprehensive.title: Individuals & Creators (B2C)
comprehensive.content: Empowering individuals to leverage artificial intelligence for skill development and business growth through training courses, content generation tools, digital fashion design, metaverse experiences, and AI tool training.

partnerships.title: Strategic Partnerships
partnerships.content: Collaborating with institutions and companies to expand service offerings and reach.
